description: Zak Spears is never to be questioned, so when he picks Ray Butler out to test his authority, the hapless prisoner knows he's going to suffer some unnecessary roughness. Down on all fours and with his ass up for plunder, Ray endures one anal probe after the other. Zak spears Ray's butt with a thick hard dildo, then follows that with a string of red rubber balls. Ouch, it's beginning to sting and Ray moans as his hole is stretched. But it is Zak's gloved fist that really sends Ray reeling.
series: The Abduction Series, Part II - The Conflict
title: The Abduction Series, Part II - The Conflict
